greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{r not a perfect power} 1/(1 - x^r).
comment: a(n) is the number of integer partitions of n whose parts are not perfect powers (A001597, A007916).
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
example: The a(9) = 5 integer partitions whose parts are not perfect powers are (72), (63), (522), (333), (3222).
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jun 07 2018
